images.copyright: Adélie penguins at Possession Island, Antarctica (© Tui De Roy/Minden Pictures)
images.title: Love on ice
images.caption: Love on ice
images.desc: There’s love in the air here in Antarctica, where these Adélie penguins have congregated after a long winter at sea. October brings them ashore in search of their breeding grounds. Here they’ll pair up and grow their families, gathering in large colonies of thousands and constructing nests made of stones piled together on the shoreline.
